comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is taken from the sidewalk on the east side of 7th Avenue, looking north toward 24th Street. Both corner buildings are still there: goo.gl/maps/jwZB3 The new subway tunnel was still under construction and the street surface was a temporary wooden tunnel roof. A trolley car full of passengers was passing over when the roof collapsed into the tunnel. See details under
